Title: Servants of the people I
Publisher: Hubei renmin chubanshe (湖北人民出版社)
Notes: This poster is part of a series. Its companion can be found here.The Mao poster in the left panel is based on a 1958 Chinese painting by Li Qi, entitled "Mao at the Ming Tombs Reservoir Site". It was published as a poster in October 1961.
